document.full_text: a mexican man who crossed into the united states illegally has been indicted for second-degree murder in the shooting death of a u.s. border patrol agent last december, u.s. prosecutors said on friday.
document.title: mexican charged in murder of u.s. border patrol agent
lines_and_colors: a mexican man who crossed into the united states illegally has been indicted for second-degree murder in the shooting death of a u.s. border patrol agent last december, u.s. prosecutors said on friday.
